ygData.subject: Re: Light bags for the young?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Actually, get large sewing kits if you want to be so goofy.  They hold 8 items, and will even hold extra-large things (like Halberds)  Just be careful to
ygData.messageBody:
At 09:14 AM 11/29/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: "Yoruneko" <animekat@...>
>
>I was experimenting with the baking skill the other day.. I bought a spit
>and noticed something! This spit is very light, Less than a pound (i think
>.2 weight? I cant remember) And it has 6 spots for holding stuff.. Im
>thinking about getting all spits for my inv spots cuz my backpacks are heavy
>with my bronze = ^_^ =


Actually, get large sewing kits if you want to be so goofy. They hold 8
items, and will even hold extra-large things (like Halberds) Just be
careful to never ever hit the "combine" button....

Talies
